extension.name: Billing Block adjustments
extension.description: Suppresses billing details in favour of other blocks
extension.comments: Extension removes billing fields and populates them from profile fields if it can. If you have a profile field called postcode then it will remove that field from the billing block and use that detail. Note that it prefers profile fields of types billing and primary Name fields need to be named first_name, last_name or middle_name to be preferred
